projects.name: Trident Hills
projects.description: A 200-acre premium township at the foothills of the Shivaliks offering luxury plots, floors, villas, and commercial spaces.
projects.overview: Trident Hills is a luxurious integrated township project by Trident Realty, located in Sector 4, Pinjore, Panchkula. Spread across 200 acres, it offers residential plots, premium low-rise floors, villas, and group housing with top-class amenities like a grand clubhouse, landscaped gardens, and 24x7 security. Its strategic location on NH-44 provides excellent connectivity to Chandigarh, Mohali, and Delhi.
locationHighlights: 2 km from Pinjore, 5 km from Panchkula
18 km from Chandigarh, 25 km from Mohali
Close to IT parks, schools, malls & hospitals

faqs.question: What is Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Trident Hills is a 200-acre premium township project by Trident Realty located in Pinjore, Panchkula. It offers a mix of plots, floors, villas, and commercial spaces.

faqs.question: What types of properties are available in Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Trident Hills offers Residential Plots, Low-rise Premium Floors, Villas, Group Housing and Commercial Spaces.

faqs.question: Where is Trident Hills located?
faqs.answer: It is located in Sector 4, Panchkula-Kalka Urban Complex, Pinjore, Panchkula (Haryana), 134102.

faqs.question: What plot sizes are available in Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Plots are available in 150, 250, 350, 500, and 1000 sq. yards.

faqs.question: How many residential plots are there?
faqs.answer: There are 682 residential plots in Trident Hills.

faqs.question: What are the prices of plots and floors?
faqs.answer: Plots start at ₹1.08 Cr and 4 BHK independent floors start from ₹2.52 Cr.

faqs.question: When is possession?
faqs.answer: Possession is expected from August 2027 onwards.

faqs.question: Which banks offer home loans?
faqs.answer: Banks like HDFC, SBI, LIC Housing Finance, and Bajaj Finance are offering home loans for this project.

faqs.question: Is the area safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 4 is rated safe by local residents (4/5).

faqs.question: What are nearby hospitals?
faqs.answer: Nearby hospitals include Khera Hospital and J N Shori Multi Speciality Hospital.

faqs.question: Any nearby schools?
faqs.answer: Yes, Aravali International School is just 1 km away and DPS Panchkula is 13 km away.

reviews.name: Sandeep Verma
reviews.comment: Amazing location and concept. The idea of a full township with all facilities is very promising. Booked a plot.

reviews.name: Neha Gupta
reviews.comment: The sample floors look great. The construction quality seems top-notch. Eagerly waiting for possession.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Trident Hills, Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102

projects.name: Trident Panipat
projects.description: An exclusive gated community offering premium residential plots and luxury villas with modern amenities in Panipat.
projects.overview: Trident Panipat is a new benchmark for luxury living in the heart of Panipat. This upcoming gated community is designed to offer a secure and upscale lifestyle with its offering of residential plots and lavish 4 & 5 BHK villas. With a focus on quality construction, thoughtful design, and essential amenities, Trident Panipat aims to be the most sought-after address for families looking for a modern and comfortable home.
locationHighlights: Located in the developing Sector 18 of Panipat
Close to major industrial hubs like Panipat Refinery & NFL
Easy access to hospitals, banks, and markets

faqs.question: What is the starting price at Trident Panipat?
faqs.answer: Trident Panipat offers residential plots starting from approximately ₹80 Lakhs.

faqs.question: Is this a good investment?
faqs.answer: Being a new launch in a prime, developing sector of Panipat with modern amenities, it holds strong potential for appreciation and is considered a good investment opportunity.

faqs.question: What configurations are available?
faqs.answer: The project offers residential plots of various sizes, along with options for 4 and 5 BHK luxury villas.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Sector 18, Near GT Road, Panipat, Haryana 132103
